colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES PA 'DI YANG DAD BRTZON DANG LDAN PA'I RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO GROS KUN DGA' BSKUL BA LAS, ,GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI RNAL 'BYOR PA 'JAM DBYANGS BSHAD PA DKON MCHOG LTAR 'PHEL SEMS CAN LA GNOD 'TSE 'CHI BDUD MANG PO 'GRO BA'I TSE THUNG DU GYUR BA LAS KYI DON DU MDZAD PA DANG, @007B YI GE PA NI PHUN TSOGS RGYAL MTSAN NO, ,'DI BRIS DGE BAS BYANG CHEN MYUR THOB SHOG , ,,DGE'O, ,LEGS SO, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
